messages.title: MORE DIVISION AND CHAOS
messages.content: The SNP are divided and fighting among themselves. They now want to divide our country with another independence referendum...and Boris Johnson's Conservatives are chaotic and reckless. They mishandled Covid and drove through Brexit in the middle of the pandemic.

messages.title: PUT RECOVERY FIRST
messages.content: With Willie Rennie's Scottish Liberal Democrats

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support to help our health services recover.
Extra support to create new, future proof jobs.
Tackling climate change with a green recovery.
Give Scotland a bigger say by reforming the UK.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Every vote for Willie Rennie's Scottish Liberal Democrats can stop more chaos and division...

issues.governance: Give Scotland a bigger say by reforming the UK.
